name: Fruit 4 Sudoku🍉 4
detailed_description:
Fruit 4 Sudoku 4 is a classic 5x5 sudoku, where all puzzle digits are replaced by various fruits. You need to fill empty grids so that each fruit is unique in every row, every column and in its 5x5 box. In this DLC, you get 25 new beautiful images of fruits.

- easy and relaxing gameplay
- a pleasant music accompaniment
- a small price
- UHD (4K) resolution support (3840x2160 pixels)
about_the_game:
Fruit 4 Sudoku 4 is a classic 5x5 sudoku, where all puzzle digits are replaced by various fruits. You need to fill empty grids so that each fruit is unique in every row, every column and in its 5x5 box. In this DLC, you get 25 new beautiful images of fruits.

- easy and relaxing gameplay
- a pleasant music accompaniment
- a small price
- UHD (4K) resolution support (3840x2160 pixels)
short_description: Fruit 4 Sudoku 4 is a classic 5x5 sudoku, where all puzzle digits are replaced by various fruits. You need to fill empty grids so that each fruit is unique in every row, every column and in its 5x5 box.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Greek*, Danish*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Vietnamese*, Spanish - Latin America*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
